PrecisTransfer, from the MINISTER OF INDIAN AFFAIRS AND NORTHERN DEVELOPMENT to the DEPUTY PRIME MINISTER, of the control and supervision of that portion of the Public Service known the RESIDENTIAL SCHOOLS UNIT, effective June 4, 2001.
